data.title: East European Council
data.text:
Political consultant, analyst, Ph.D.

In 2015, made a research paper at the National Pedagogical University named after M.P. Drahomanov “Political language as an instrument of socio-political reality”.

In 2015, together with the academic staff of the Institute of International Relations of Kyiv National University named after T.G. Shevchenko founded the “International Center for Progressive Studies” project – an analytical center that developed recommendations in the field of international policy.

In 2017, founded the “Public Diplomacy Foundation” – a consulting agency that provides services in the following areas:

– political consulting (organization of election campaigns in Ukraine and abroad, media support);

– strategic consulting (research of international political and security risks in Eastern Europe, the Caucasus and Central Asia and mechanisms for responding to them, consultations for state authorities in the development of relations with the countries of the region);

– financial management (legal assistance with the management of foreign assets in Ukraine, assistance in bringing Ukrainian products to international markets);

– promotion of Ukrainian interests abroad using public diplomacy technologies.

In 2018, by decree of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine, was approved as a member of the Supervisory Board of the Ukrainian Institute – a state institution involved in producing of the cultural and social dimension of Ukrainian foreign policy.

Key areas of interest: international politics, political communication, political consulting.

Born in Yerevan, Armenia, lives in Chisinau, Republic of Moldova. Political scientist, blogger, freelancer. Former assistant at the Moldovan Presidential administration and former advisor in the Moldovan Parliament.

Main areas of interest: post-Soviet space, ‘frozen’ conflicts, Black sea region, Eastern partnership. 21 years of overall professional experience.

In charge of Moldavian and Caucasus projects in East European Council.

Expert in the field of international relations.

Political scientist, teacher of NU “Ostroh Academy”, expert of the Center for Political Studies of NU “Ostroh Academy”, co-founder of NGO “Polis”.

Graduated from the master’s degree at the Ostroh Academy, majoring in “Political Science” (2010), as well as a doctoral degree at the University of Warsaw, majoring in “Political Science” (2016). Scholar of the Erasmus Webb program (2013-2016).

Field of scientific interests: political regimes, informal politics, world geopolitical processes and Ukraine’s place in them.

Expert in the field of internal political, economic, social, regional situation in Poland and Ukraine.

Political and commercial consultant, analyst.

In 2017, he became one of the co-founders of the analytical center “Public Diplomacy Foundation”. As part of this activity, he organizes research on the countries of Eastern Europe, the South Caucasus, and Central Asia.

In 2015, he began active work in the field of political consulting, which includes:

– implementation of public support for the activities of politicians;

– planning, development and implementation of information campaigns;

– active involvement in election campaigns at the local and national levels.

In charge of political consulting, organizing of election campaign and media support. Expert in the field of political technologies.

Ukrainian political expert, market research analyst, and journalist with 10+ years of experience and a Master’s Degree Diploma with Distinction in International Relations (Mariupol State University). Collaborated with mass media and wrote articles about foreign policy, international politics, and geopolitics. Worked in Trading House Azovmashexport LLC as a Head of Strategic Development, conducted research on rail wagon, metallurgical, and related markets, as well as provided information support for the top management of the company. As a freelancer prepared analytical reports and researched industrial, agricultural, and hi-tech markets for NGOs and private companies like Civil Diplomacy Fund, Association of Milk Producers, Inhale Tech, Most Franchising, AgroYoumis PL Sp.z o.o.

He is fond of politics, geopolitics, and analytical work and is open to cooperation.
